issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Use aHash and std::collections hashmap for aggregates / distinct
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10572](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10572). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Ahash is a faster hash algorithm than FNV.
